data.text: À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ!
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa Zeluzalɛme losu ʋolu,
Toɠa naati balo, niiti ti yiiɠoloɠologai,
Toɠa a ɗa somideɠaiti tiegi leve ba,
Ade-Maliɠii wɔɔlɔʋɛ, ná-zobogi maayiki,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa ɓɔɠɔmaayei nuiti suzo,
À guyei loo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ ga faanɛɛ wuuɠwɛɛgai.
Toɠa ɗa geeɠɔlɔgi maalɔɔɠu ga tonaɓiingiti,
Toɠa ɗa togani ɓulugiti daamianigi ve ti ya,
Sooi ná-suɓaai la gaazu ga faa nɔpɛ,
Kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wɔinʋɛ ga naati, niiti ti luazu ba,
Zeluzalɛme, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI lɛbi!
Mazɔlɔɔ é ta ɓɔgɛ è makɛ vai ʋa,
Toɠa ɓaazu ɗa-you ɠwɛgiti ma, ɗa zoo è zei ziilɛigi zu,
Toɠa ná-devei leʋesu eteai zu.
Toɠa kɔɔlɛ vukɔi vazasu eɠɛ baala deɠai,
Toɠa sakɔtui ʋilisu eɠɛ kɔtui.
Kɛlɛ a devei veena feya, ti ɠaa ɠa ɗa wuun,
Toɠa daawooi wosu Zakɔɓe ma,
É la ɠɛni naa ɠɛɠala ɠɛɛni zii taɠili nɔpɛ bɛ,
